nav.spaceLaunch: yamenutomeyimɔ̃ kple afɔku siwo le eme
nav.briefHistory: aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe ŋutinya kpui aɖe le yamenutome
nav.sustainability: nusiwo li tegbee kple yamenutome ƒe gbeɖuɖɔwo

ritual.label: kɔnuwɔwɔ
ritual.ariaLabel: Ge ɖe kɔnua me - Ðo ŋkɔ ɖe Orbital Gbedoxɔa me

footer.credits: Orbital Gbedoxɔ nye Edson Pavoni ƒe nutata, si wowɔ le nuwɔwɔ aduadu kple Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista & João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Sathi Roy, kple amesiwo katã yi edzi le ŋkɔwo ɖom ɖe gbedoxɔ sia me.
